name: Descent: Floating Butterfly
outcome: {AttackerName} performs a series of quick motions with her hands, forming an illusionary silhouette of a butterfly over her bouncing chest! Mesmerized, {TargetName} can only watch it's slow, fluttering descent until the butterfly gently lands on {TargetHisOrHer} face, closely followed by {AttackerName}'s bountiful breasts!
miss: {AttackerName} performs a series of quick motions with her hands, forming an illusionary silhouette of a butterfly over her bouncing chest! But the butterfly shatters and the dragoness pouts!
